text:
Hi,
I am using jakarta-poi-1.8.0-dev. I am opening a hssf workbook using poifs .The 
work book is having a macro. It is throwing a windows exception and closes the 
excel itself.
I got struck in my project because of this.

Thanks,
Dinesh
creator: gvdinesh@lycos.com
avik@apache.org
text:
A windows exception? Whats that?

Please submit 
1. Simple Example worksheet that shows the error. 
2. Minimum code to replicate the error.
3. All steps needed to replicate the error.
